def_cn: (警察或士兵)突击搜查，突然袭击
def_en: If police or soldiers swoop on a place, they go there suddenly and quickly, usually in order to arrest someone or to attack the place.

def_cn: (鸟或飞机)向下猛冲，俯冲
def_en: When a bird or aeroplane swoops, it suddenly moves downwards through the air in a smooth curving movement.
If something is done in one fell swoop or at one fell swoop, it is done on a single occasion or by a single action.
